楎字的基本解释

楎
huī
钉在墙上挂衣物的木橛。

楎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hún］
［《廣韻》户昆切，平魂，匣。］
［《廣韻》許歸切，平微，曉。］
三脚耧。古代的一种三行条播器。一说指犁上曲木。
[②]［huī］
［《廣韻》許歸切，平微，曉。］
亦作“椲2”。
钉在墙上，用来悬挂衣服的木橛。

楎字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楎； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页538第38
【唐韻】戸昆切【集韻】胡昆切，?音渾。【說文】六叉犂。一曰犂上曲木，犂轅。　又【集韻】古本切，音袞。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?吁韋切，音暉。或作椲。橜也。【爾雅·釋宮】杙在牆者謂之楎。　又縣衣具。【禮·內則】不敢縣于夫之楎椸。【郭璞註】直曰楎，橫曰椸，同類之物。　又【集韻】居云切，音君。義同。

楎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
楎字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
huī
Wooden prongs nailed to the wall to hang clothes.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hún］
["Guangyun" Hu Kunqie, Ping Hun, Xia. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Guiqie, Pingwei, Xiao. ]
Three-legged columbine. An ancient three-line drill. One refers to the curved wood on the plough.
[②]［huī］
["Guangyun" Xu Guiqie, Pingwei, Xiao. ]
Also known as "椲2".
A wooden prong nailed to the wall to hang clothes.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楎; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 538 Page 38
[Tang Yun] Hu Kunqie [Jiyun] Hu Kunqie, the sound is muddy. [Said the text] Six-forked plough. One said that the plow was bent on the wood, and the plow shaft.　[Jiyun] Ancient version cut, sound tang. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Call on Wei Qi, Yin Hui. Or make it.橜 also. 【Erya·Shigong】Those who are on the wall are called 楎.　Youxian clothing. 【Rite·Nei Ze】Don't dare to count on the husband's bankruptcy. [Guo Pu's Note] Straightly said tree, horizontally said tree, a thing of the same kind.　[Jiyun] Juyunqie, Yinjun. The same meaning.
